author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Chilli Prawns With Coriander & Lime recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chilli Prawns With Coriander & Lime Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 fresh red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
16 cooked prawns, peeled and deveined, but with tails left on

recipeInstructions.text: Put the prawns in a large bowl. Add half of the coriander and the fresh chillies, and mix well. Tip in the butter beans, and toss again.

Arrange the rocket leaves in a large serving bowl or on 4 individual plates. Sprinkle over a little of the lime juice, a pinch of salt, and some black pepper. Add the remaining lime juice to the prawns, stir through, then taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
Spoon the prawn mixture over the rocket leaves, then drizzle the sweet chilli sauce over it, and sprinkle over the remaining coriander. Serve immediately.
